pageContext.claim: “Chris, we have a radical left destructive ideology and it's being taught in our schools. And don't act like you're surprised to hear this -- there are books written about it, and we can't let that go on. We can't let them change the true meaning of what we're all about and that's what they're trying to do and I don't want it to happen.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is referring to increasingly open conversations about race in America in schools. Race undeniably impacts large parts of American history, discussing it is not “radical.”
